Articles.Content:
I think the camera could be useful for some very juicy science harvesting.

In any case, good to hear it's adapted!

Whenever I install the docking cam, I get some horrible texture, instead of the black and yellow one. The texture I get is just clear. I've checked it isn't my mods, as I tried on a stock install... I'm on a mac.

I think the camera could be useful for some very juicy science harvesting.

In any case, good to hear it's adapted!

i think it would be cool for the camera to have a laser built in. one you can see. it would make aiming easier while in orbit looking down at the planet surface. but not only that, maybe infrared vision mode or different modes. maybe the laser could actually detect a little science about the terrain.

I love your work Romfarer, I put the lazor system on all my vehicles and use the arms on my station. I'm wondering, just for the sake of having some more choices aesthetically if you could make a radial mounted version, but Kerbalized in your own style similar to this: http://www.sflorg.com/comm_center/lockheed_martin/images/p691_17_02.jpg

I don't mean look wise but I love the movement of it. The base on top of the plate/attachment point could turn 360, with the upper section being able to pivot something like 80 to -80.

Edited October 24, 2013 by Nostromo
Not sure if this is just me but the lazor bomb seems to be missing from the weapons pack? well excited to give them a go like
:Dawesome mod:D

I wonder if that woudl be possible. Adding to cabin interior model of some screen (possibly some old tv to follow "rocket made from scraps style"), and show on that screen image from lazor docking cam, or other camera.

I wonder if that woudl be possible. Adding to cabin interior model of some screen (possibly some old tv to follow "rocket made from scraps style"), and show on that screen image from lazor docking cam, or other camera.

I think adding these features to the cam would give it more purpose. I use it on everything exploration wise.
i want the bomb so badly!!!!!!!!!

Ok, I've done something wrong. How is this supposed to installed? I DL'ed it, put the Romfarer folder in Gamedata, and tried to play. I'm getting a complete lack of the mods features, the parts load in, but none of the plugin's functions work (no gui, no lazors, nothing), even tried a fresh download of .22 and v31. Romfarer.dll is in KSP .22/Gamedata/Romfarer/romfarer.dll.

just put the gamedata folder in ksp

does anyone know where the icons is?

Edited November 5, 2013 by Specialist290
Merging double-post

Is this mod adapted for 0.22 career mode? I'm asking because I quite advanced in the technological tree and I can't see my lazor modules anywhere.

If not , can somebody tell me how do I make the modules appear?

Edited November 3, 2013 by jebodiah1976
added how to make modules appear

just put the gamedata folder in ksp

That's what I did. >:[
Does this mod work with Mechjeb yet?- I know there were issues with the docking camera when Mechjeb was installed on both ships. It would cause crazy RCS burns on the final docking approach.

Is this mod adapted for 0.22 career mode? I'm asking because I quite advanced in the technological tree and I can't see my lazor modules anywhere.

If not , can somebody tell me how do I make the modules appear?

I'd really appreciate an answer on this.

Is this mod adapted for 0.22 career mode? I'm asking because I quite advanced in the technological tree and I can't see my lazor modules anywhere.

If not , can somebody tell me how do I make the modules appear?

It appears to be, the parts are unlocked at the experimentalElectrics tech stage.

It appears to be, the parts are unlocked at the experimentalElectrics tech stage.

Oh so it's unlocked later on, gotcha.

Thank you!

Ok, I've done something wrong. How is this supposed to installed? I DL'ed it, put the Romfarer folder in Gamedata, and tried to play. I'm getting a complete lack of the mods features, the parts load in, but none of the plugin's functions work (no gui, no lazors, nothing), even tried a fresh download of .22 and v31. Romfarer.dll is in KSP .22/Gamedata/Romfarer/romfarer.dll.

Any news on this? I don't get any GUI's popping up, and trying to turn on the lazor module in-game does nothing. I don't even get the menu at the Space Center. The Romfarer folder is in gamedata, as it should be.

do you put the main lazor on?

Edited November 5, 2013 by seson

do you put the lazor on?

Well, yes. All of the parts load in correctly, but trying to turn them on does nothing. I don't even get the settings menu at the space center screen. This makes me think that the plugin is derping out, but the filepath is correct (I think).
Did you unplug it and plug it in again?
can you add a bomb?:):):):)

Did you unplug it and plug it in again?

Yes, it didn't help any. It's still not working.

Yes, it didn't help any. It's still not working.

What is the full path to Romfarer.dll?

Are you sure you don't have multiple Romfarer.dll in your gamedata folder?

What OS?

And please upload your output_log.txt file.
